name: Made in Outer Space
description:
Your journey begins in the outer solar system. You must fight your way back to Earth through waves of hostile space pirates. Be careful, you won't last very long unless you salvage new equipment from their remains. Can you build a ship strong enough to survive the journey?

Features:
  • Build your own ship out of scavenged components.
  • Fight AI ships in a Newtonian zero-G flight simulation.
  • Supports mouse and keyboard and common game-pads.
Recommended Requirements:
  • Intel Core i5 (or equivalent)
  • NVIDIA GTX960 (or equivalent)
  • 8GB RAM
